alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Parmer (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 2:50PM CST by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bailey and Parmer Counties through 330 PM CST... At 249 PM CST, radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles north of Clovis to 30 miles south of Clovis. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects and vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Muleshoe, Friona, Bovina, Farwell, Needmore, Progress, Oklahoma Lane, Lariat, Rhea, Muleshoe Wildlife Refuge, and West Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
